name: Meat Meets Mouth
description:
You're hungry for nuggets!!!!

Eat the nuggets to win the game.

Close your jaw by holding down the mouse buttons!
It opens by itself.  Chomp the nuggets multiple times to eat them.

Your hand will slap the nuggets into your face for consumption.
You should guide it using WASD in a standard configuration.

God speed, meats man.

----------------------------------

This game made in 7 hours for Friday Palette Jam

code + tune: tfx

code + gfx + snd: HomingDevice
